items.sentence: He won the first prize at the chess tournament.

How long do you intend to spend at the library?
Please make certain your seat belt is fastened.
Please stay seated until we reach the terminal.
Prices are double what they were ten years ago.
Put Tom off until I have time to think it over.
Seen from afar, the hill resembled an elephant.

Tom showed up at the party dressed as a pirate.
